VFECore.Misc.HireableFactionDef.label: colonization force mercenaries
VFECore.Misc.HireableFactionDef.description: A group of organized mercenaries, the core members of which are mostly non-commissioned officers and amateur militiamen in the colonial fleet. They take on any job, from cargo escort to clearing insect hives. And if you can afford it, they won't mind taking down a fortress with some heavy firepower.
